kubejs.tip.jei_qb: JEI is your friend, and so is the questbook!
kubejs.tip.excavator: Need ressources in the early-game? Check out the Excavator!
kubejs.tip.biodiesel: It's always nice having a Diesel Generator early.
kubejs.tip.custom_loot: Dimensional Dungeons are full of custom loots, go get them partner!
kubejs.tip.easy_exploration: Not a fan of exploration? You can make useful tools in chapter 5 like a Jetpack, Heart Containers and even a new sword!
kubejs.tip.ae2: AE2 will be your main storage for the whole pack! Channels are disabled so no need
kubejs.tip.ae2_automation: You'll unlock AE2 Automation in chapter 8, from there on, automating everything is highly recommended!
kubejs.tip.casing: There are already 11 Machine Casing Tiers, and more to come!
kubejs.tip.batch_craft: Always craft more than you need, because you always need more!
kubejs.tip.too_slow: Are your machines too slow? Try upgrading them! Or make more!
kubejs.tip.void: Tired of Mobs? Night? World gen? And prefer the everending sky beyond? Check out the Void Dim! Perfect place to build your base.
kubejs.tip.entangloporter: In chapter 8, you can use Quantum Entangloporter to transport stuff across dimensions.
kubejs.tip.quantum_ring: You can use Quantum Rings to expand your ME System across dimensions.
kubejs.tip.quantum_miner: Once reaching the automation stage, the Quantum Miner will constitute your main ore production until Mystical Agriculture.
kubejs.tip.mgu: Mob Grinding Utils will help you a ton when making mob farms, make sure to use it efficiently
kubejs.tip.expert: This is an expert pack, things are destined to be hard. Don't give up and keep automating!
kubejs.tip.morph_tool: You can use the Morphing Tool to combine multiple wrenches into one!
